issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: DN should not delete the block On "Too many open files" Exception

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: If the DN has a block its volume map but not on-disk, it tells clients it's an invalid block id.  The NN is not informed of the missing block until either the bp slice scanner or the directory scanner detects the missing block.  DN should remove the replica from the volume map and inform the NN.
fields.summary: DN should notify NN when client requests a missing block

comments.body: Uploaded the patch. Thanks [~daryn] for reporting this.
